Sept. 11, 2005 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Best march - Lofthouse. Best soloist - euphonium - Cockedrton. Section 4 and ungraded bands - best hymn - Elland, best march - Friendly.
Dec. 17, 2012, 10:37 a.m. Oct. 8, 2015, 9:33 a.m.
1 Broughtons Brass [Durham] Graeme Tindall
2 Cockerton Prize Silver Band George Nicklin
3 Lofthouse 2000 Brass Band Andrew Whitaker
4 Wetherby and District Silver Glyn Kearsley
5 Elland Youth Band Samantha Harrison
6 Friendly Band (Sowerby Bridge) Carol Cayton
